SWEET.title: Bhundhi Laddu
SWEET.description: combining lovely little bits of fried and sugar-soaked batter (made with gram flour/besan) with seeds and fragrant spices

SWEET.title: RavvaLaddu
SWEET.description: made by grinding husked wheat and is used in Indian cuisine to make savoury dishes such as rava dosa, rava idli, upma, and khichdis

SWEET.title: Arisalu
SWEET.description: Arisa is an Indian sweet from Andhra Pradesh, Odisha, Telangana
